Description: Secure, scalable web application infrastructure with multi-region deployment, GDPR compliance, and comprehensive security controls.

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix for resource naming (e.g., dev, staging, prod)

ProjectName.ConstraintDescription: Must contain only alphanumeric characters and hyphens

VpcCidr.Description: CIDR block for the VPC in the primary region (us-east-1)

PublicSubnetCidr.Description: CIDR block for the first public subnet in primary region

PrivateSubnetCidr.Description: CIDR block for the first private subnet in primary region

BastionSshCidr.Description: CIDR block for SSH access to Bastion Host (MUST be restricted in production)

WebServerAmiId.Description: AMI ID for web servers (e.g., ami-0abcdef1234567890 for Amazon Linux 2)

InstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for web servers

MinInstances.Description: Minimum number of web server instances in Auto Scaling Group

MaxInstances.Description: Maximum number of web server instances in Auto Scaling Group

WebAppPort.Description: Port on which the web application runs on EC2 instances

DataRetentionDays.Description: Data retention period in days for logs and backups (e.g., for GDPR)

AdminMfaRequired.Description: Set to true to enforce MFA for admin users (IAM Account Password Policy)

AdminUserEmail.Description: Email address for security notifications and MFA setup

Description.Fn::Sub: ${ProjectName}-${EnvironmentSuffix} KMS key for encryption at rest

Statement.Sid: Allow use of the key for CloudWatch Logs
Allow RDS to use the key
Allow DynamoDB to use the key

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for web application servers
Security group for Application Load Balancer

Properties.Description: Outbound to web servers on application port
Strict MFA enforcement for all administrative actions

UserData.Fn::Base64:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Hello from CloudFormation web server!" > /var/www/html/index.html
yum update -y
yum install -y httpd
systemctl start httpd
systemctl enable httpd

WebApplicationSecurityGroupId.Description: ID of the web application security group

DatabaseSecurityGroupId.Description: ID of the database security group

ApplicationLoadBalancerDNS.Description: DNS name of the Application Load Balancer

WebACLArn.Description: ARN of the Web Application Firewall

SecureDynamoTableName.Description: Name of the secure DynamoDB table

SecureDynamoTableArn.Description: ARN of the secure DynamoDB table

KMSKeyId.Description: ID of the KMS key used for encryption

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix used for this deployment

BastionHostPublicIp.Description: Public IP of the Bastion Host

SecurityNotificationsTopicArn.Description: ARN of the Security Notifications SNS Topic

AdminUserArn.Description: ARN of the example Admin IAM User

VPCFlowLogsLogGroupName.Description: Name of the VPC Flow Logs Log Group
